enWisdom: Facilitating [and making things easy for others] makes sustenance flow abundantly

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِلُزُومِ الْحَلَالِ وَحُسْنِ الْبِرِّ بِالْعِيَالِ وَذِكْرِ اللَّهِ فِي كُلِّ حَالٍ
enWisdom: You should cling to the lawful, and to treating your family with kindness, and to remembering Allah in all circumstances

Wisdom: كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مَسْئُولٌ عَمَّا مَلَكَتْ يَمِينُهُ وَعِيَالِهِ
enWisdom: Every person is answerable for what is in his possession and his family

Wisdom: مَنْ أَسَاءَ إِلَى أَهْلِهِ لَمْ يَتَّصِلْ بِهِ تَأْمِيلٌ
enWisdom: Whoever wrongs his [own] family, no hope [of any goodness] can be attached to him

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَغْنَى كَرُمَ عَلَى أَهْلِهِ وَمَنِ افْتَقَرَ هَانَ عَلَيْهِمْ
enWisdom: One who becomes independent becomes an honour for his people and one who is needy becomes contemptible to them

Wisdom: مِنْ سَعَادَةِ الْمَرْءِ أَنْ يَضَعَ مَعْرُوفَهُ عِنْدَ أَهْلِهِ
enWisdom: From the felicity of a person is his showing benevolence to those who are deserving of it

Wisdom: لَا يَكُنْ أَهْلُكَ وَذُو وُدِّكَ أَشْقَى النَّاسِ بِكَ
enWisdom: Let not your family or those whom you love be the most miserable of people because of you

Wisdom: لَا تَجْعَلْ أَكْبَرَ هَمِّكَ بِأَهْلِكَ وَوُلْدِكَ فَإِنَّهُمْ إِنْ يَكُونُوا أَوْلِيَاءَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يُضَيِّعُ وَلِيَّهُ وَإِنْ يَكُونُوا أَعْدَاءَ اللَّهِ فَمَا هَمُّكَ بِأَعْدَاءِ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: Do not make your family and children your greatest concern, for indeed if they are friends of Allah, the Glorified, then Allah does not forsake His friend, and if they are the enemies of Allah then what is your concern for the enemies of Allah?
